description: No where to store you iPad's keyboard when you are on the go?  Don't worry, this case transports both your tablet and keyboard while doubling as a mobile work station.  Set the case in your lap or on a table top and prop up your iPad in the unzipped back compartment. With your keyboard also stored right inside, you are all set to start typing away.
title: Case Logic 10-Inch iPad/iPad2/Tablet Attache' (Black) (VTA-210)
